name: PublishGitHubRelease
description: Publish GitHub Release including uploading assets
author: Jakob Ehn

inputs.name: applicationName
inputs.label: ApplicationName
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the application using the GitHub API

inputs.name: gitSourceUrl
inputs.label: External Git URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the git server. For example, http://localgit

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT). Use a secret variable for this value

inputs.name: tagName
inputs.label: Tag Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the tag to create in the repository for this release, for example v1.2.3 or v$(build.buildNumber)

inputs.name: releaseName
inputs.label: Release Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the release. You can use variables here, such as $(build.buildNumber)

inputs.name: releaseBody
inputs.label: Release Body
inputs.helpMarkDown: Text describing the content of the tag. Markdown is supported

inputs.name: draft
inputs.label: Draft
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the release is a draft (unpublished)

inputs.name: prerelease
inputs.label: Prerelease
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the release is a prerelease

inputs.name: assetsPattern
inputs.label: Assets To Upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: The files to upload as assets to the new release. Minimatch patterns are supported
